statements: SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM ProviderInformation WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation WHERE office_location='New York';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, billing_details FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id=3;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation WHERE specialty='Dermatology' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, office_location FROM ProviderInformation WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation WHERE specialty = 'Dermatology' AND office_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, office_location, billing_details FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id > 3 ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, billing_details FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_name LIKE 'Dr.%' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, office_location FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingDetails WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, office_location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, office_location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dermatologist' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingDetails WHERE provider_id = 3 AND payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, office_location FROM Providers WHERE provider_id > 2 AND specialty LIKE '%Surgeon%' ORDER BY office_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, office_location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT * FROM ProviderBilling ORDER BY billing_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM Providers JOIN ProviderContacts ON Providers.provider_id = ProviderContacts.provider_id WHERE Providers.specialty = 'Pediatrician';
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, office_location FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty='Dentist';
SELECT p.provider_name, pb.billing_details FROM Providers p INNER JOIN ProviderBilling pb ON p.provider_id = pb.provider_id;
SELECT pc.contact_name, p.provider_name, pc.contact_email FROM ProviderContacts pc LEFT JOIN Providers p ON pc.provider_id = p.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provider_id, name, office_location FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM ProviderSpecialties;
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_amount, payment_status FROM BillingDetails WHERE payment_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM Providers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE office_location LIKE '%Main%';
SELECT p.name, bs.specialty_name, od.office_address FROM Providers p JOIN ProviderSpecialties bs ON p.specialty = bs.specialty_name JOIN OfficeLocations od ON p.office_location = od.office_address;
SELECT p.name, bd.invoice_number, bd.invoice_amount FROM Providers p JOIN BillingDetails bd ON p.provider_id = bd.provider_id WHERE bd.payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, office_location FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT p.provider_name, o.office_name, s.specialty_name FROM providers p JOIN offices o ON p.provider_id = o.provider_id JOIN specialties s ON p.specialty = s.specialty_name;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM provider_contacts WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC, specialty ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, office_location FROM providers JOIN offices ON providers.provider_id = offices.provider_id WHERE providers.provider_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, bill_amount FROM providers JOIN billing_details ON providers.provider_id = billing_details.provider_id WHERE billing_details.payment_status = TRUE;

SELECT provider_name, specialty, address FROM providers JOIN offices ON providers.provider_id = offices.provider_id JOIN specialties ON providers.specialty = specialties.specialty_name WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM provider_contacts JOIN providers ON provider_contacts.provider_id = providers.provider_id WHERE providers.provider_name = 'John Doe';
